Despite a 43-minute rain delay, Cameron was ready to roll from the start. play-43 Game Recap play-44 Condensed Game Watch Archive carousel-arrow-right-113 Player of the Game Player of the Game Cameron 6.2 IP, 0 ER, 8 K, 2 BB +36.1% WPA See Leaderboard arrow-next-4 Top Performers Cameron 6.2 IP 7 H, 0 ER, 8 SO Holmes, C 5.0 IP 5 H, 2 ER, 2 SO Manaea L, 3.1 IP 5 H, 1 ER, 7 SO Team Comparison R H HR TB SB LOB E Mets 2 9 0 14 0 8 0 Royals 3 10 0 12 1 6 0 More Coverage This Royals Draft pick left home when he was 14 ... now he's pro-ready Manaea impressive in '25 debut despite surrendering walk-off hit Key Moments Scoring All Video Strikeouts Hard Hit Balls Lead Changes Win Probability Swings Top 1st Bases. 0 - 0, 1 Out Triple Mark Vientos triples (2) on a fly ball to right fielder Jac Caglianone.
